name: Potion Picker
description:
Our first game together, an entry for the BYOG game jam 2022! Made by winnie33 and bangsaapjen.

In this cute game you play the role of a wizard who is tasked to collect potions for the potion seller. Move across the world and gather ingredients to brew potions. Have fun!

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Space to interact
